duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all renewals and identify upsell opportunities in an assigned territory.
Collaborate with Customer Success, Channel, and Sales teams to understand existing sales motions and ensure customer satisfaction.
Validate and confirm the accuracy of all supporting data for quotes and resolve any discrepancies.

Document daily renewals activities in Salesforce, prepare accurate reports and forecasts, manage pipeline, and perform other tasks necessary to drive renewals revenue, customer retention, and expansion.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
